Package com.jswiff.swfrecords

Class Summary
AlignmentZone TODO: Comments
AlphaBitmapData This class is used within DefineBitsLossless2 tags (with 32-bit RGBA images).
AlphaColorMapData This class is used within DefineBitsLossless2 tags (with 8-bit colormapped images).
BevelFilter TODO: Comments
BitmapData This class is used within DefineBitsLossless tags (with 15-bit or 24-bit RGB images).
BitmapPixelData Base class for container classes used for the representation of bitmap pixel data.
BlendMode TODO: Comments
BlurFilter TODO: Comments
ButtonCondAction This record is used to define the button's event handlers.
ButtonRecord A button record defines a character to be displayed in one or more button states.
ClipActionRecord This class defines an event handler for a sprite.
ClipActions This class is used for defining event handlers for sprites.
ClipEventFlags This class implements a container for event flags.
Color Base class for colors.
ColorMapData This class is used within DefineBitsLossless tags (with 8-bit colormapped images).
ColorMatrixFilter TODO: Comments
ConvolutionFilter TODO: Comments
CurvedEdgeRecord This class is used for defining quadratic Bezier curves.
CXform This record defines a simple transform that can be applied to the color space of an object.
CXformWithAlpha This record defines a simple transform that can be applied to the color space and the alpha channel of an object.
DropShadowFilter TODO: Comments
EdgeRecord Base class for edge shape records which define primitives like lines and curves.
EnhancedStrokeStyle Base class for the new enhanced stroke line styles introduced in SWF 8.
FillStyle This class is used to define a fill style.
FillStyleArray Implements an array of fill styles.
Filter TODO: Comments
FocalGradient Use only with DefineShape4.
FocalMorphGradient Use only with DefineMorphShape2.
GlowFilter TODO: Comments
GlyphEntry This class describes a single text character by referencing a glyph from the text font's glyph table.
Gradient Gradients are used for interpolation between at least two colors defined by control points.
GradientBevelFilter TODO: Comments
GradientGlowFilter TODO: Comments
GradRecord This class implements a gradient control point.
KerningRecord A kerning record is used to adjust the distance between two glyphs.
KeyCodes This class contains key codes.
LangCode This class identifies a spoken language that applies to text.
LineStyle This class is used to define a line style.
LineStyle2 This class is used to define a line style.
LineStyleArray Implements an array of line styles.
Matrix This class is used to represent a standard 2D transform matrix (used for affine transforms).
MorphFillStyle This class is used to define fill styles used in a morph sequence (as array within a DefineMorphShape tag.
MorphFillStyles Implements an array of fill styles used in a morphing sequence.
MorphGradient This class is used for defining gradients used in morph sequences (within MorphFillStyle instances).
MorphGradRecord This class is used for defining a pair of control points for morph gradients (see MorphGradient for details).
MorphLineStyle This class is used to define line styles used in morph sequences.
MorphLineStyle2 This class is used to define line styles used in morph sequences.
MorphLineStyles Implements an array of line styles used in a morph sequence.
Pix15 This class is used for the representation of 15-bit pixel data.
Pix24 This class is used for the representation of 24-bit pixel data.
Rect This class is used for the representation of a rectangle.
RegisterParam This class is used by DefineFunction2 to specify the function's parameters.
RGB Represents a 24-bit RGB color.
RGBA This class represents a color as a 32-bit red, green, blue and alpha value.
Shape This class is used for defining shapes, e.g. by the DefineFont tag in order to define the character glyphs of a font, or within a DefineMorphShape tag.
ShapeRecord Base class for shape records which define style changes or primitives like lines and curves.
ShapeWithStyle This class extends the Shape class by including fill and line styles.
SoundEnvelope This class is used for time-based volume control within SoundInfo.
SoundInfo This class provides information used for playing an event sound defined with the DefineSound tag.
StraightEdgeRecord This class is used for defining a line between two points.
StyleChangeRecord Unlike StraightEdgeRecord and CurvedEdgeRecord, this shape record is used for changing the actual style rather than defining new shapes.
SWFHeader Instances of this class represent a header of an SWF file.
TextRecord A TextRecord contains a group of characters which share the same style and are on the same text line.
ZlibBitmapData Base class for lossless bitmap data.
